about.me: Mexican stake pool operator with a degree in Electronics Engineering and MSc. in Computer Science. The operator has participated in artificial intelligence research and development of vision-based navigation systems for autonomous robots using convolutional neural networks, reinforcement learning and consensus algorithms. Long-time Bitcoin advocate, 11+ years of experience with cryptocurrencies, and a deep passion for Cardano's Proof-of-Stake (PoS) protocol.
about.server: The block producer is located in Mexico, a Cardano node running on arm-based Mac Mini M1. Relay nodes are low-powered decives deployed in Mexico and the United States.
